title: 3 and Out - Draft Thoughts; Zach Wilson Doubts; More Bad Kraft/Belichick Vibes; Daniel Jones Pressure Cooker; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Draft Thoughts; Zach Wilson Doubts; More Bad Kraft/Belichick Vibes; Daniel Jones Pressure Cooker; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John shares some of his thoughts on the draft, including what he's hearing from his sources around the league and his doubts about BYU's Zach Wilson. He also explains why Robert Kraft's recent comments lend more fuel to the theory that he could cut eventually ties with Bill Belichick, why Daniel Jones and the Giants organization is under a ton of pressure, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
